product_name: MSR EVO Snowshoe Flotation Tails - 6 inch
long_description: Add extra floatation to your MSR(R) EVO Snowshoes--great in soft snow conditions and when carrying heavy loads. Increases effectiveness in variable conditions by providing an extra six inches of length for greater flotation. Easy on/off design for quick changes on the trail.
short_description: Add extra floatation to your MSR(R) EVO Snowshoes--great in soft snow conditions and when carrying heavy loads.
